src:
新子安駅で人身事故、ＪＲ京浜東北線など一時運転見合わせ

05 Nov 2019, 13:45

　５日午後１０時１分頃、ＪＲ京浜東北線の新子安駅で人身事故が発生した。
　この影響で、同線の大宮―大船駅間の上下線や東海道線などで一時運転を見合わせた。
text:
Personal accidents at Shinkoyasu Station, JR Keihin Tohoku Line, etc.

05 Nov 2019, 13:45

A personal accident occurred at Shinkoyasu Station on the JR Keihin Tohoku Line at around 10: 1 pm on the 5th.
Due to this influence, we temporarily stopped driving on the upper and lower lines between the Omiya and Ofuna stations on the same line and the Tokaido Line.
